Description: The Taganrog pre-trial detention center has turned into a place of torture for Ukrainians - -Mediazona-Previously, women, minors and mothers with children awaiting trial were kept in the Taganrog pre-trial detention center-2. However, from mid-2022, captive Ukrainians, both military and civilian, began to be sent here en masse, writes -Mediazone-.One of The first stories about torture in this pre-trial detention center belong to the former military man Dmitry Lisovets. Eyewitnesses describe the -reception- as follows: blindfolded prisoners with shackled hands were thrown from trucks, beaten, lined up along the wall and continued to be hit with sticks, legs, and electric shockers. If someone lost consciousness, they were revived with ammonia and beaten again. After this, the prisoners were taken to offices, where they were interrogated on the floor, demanding to give personal information.

Title: The GRU financed the Taliban to carry out terrorist attacks again...
Description: The GRU financed the Taliban to carry out terrorist attacks against the United States in Afghanistan - The InsiderRussian intelligence maintained ties with the Taliban in Afghanistan and provided financial support for terrorist attacks against American troops in the 2010s. Journalists from The Insider and Spiegel came to this conclusion, having a joint investigation.According to journalists, from 2016 to 2020 the Taliban carried out a series of attacks on US military bases and carried out terrorist attacks near these facilities. The casualties included not only American troops, but also Afghan soldiers and civilians. As journalists point out, these attacks were supported by the GRU. For the murder of one American serviceman, the perpetrators received up to 200 thousand dollars. In total, Russia could have transferred about $30 million to the Taliban, according to former Afghan intelligence officials.The money arrived through couriers with Russian passports issued with the help of the GRU. The operation was organized by unit 29115 of the GRU, known for the case of the poisoning of the Skripals in the UK, the explosion at a warehouse in Vrbetice, Czech Republic, and other international sabotage. The intended purpose of these attacks was to put pressure on the United States to withdraw from Afghanistan.The investigation relies on testimony from former Afghan intelligence officials and information they found about GRU connections with the smugglers, the Azizi brothers, who sources say , participated in schemes for paying money to the Taliban. The investigation also names the alleged GRU curators of these operations.

Description: The driver of a dump truck, responsible for an accident with three deaths, will go to war. There will be no trialIn December in Petrozavodsk, 42-year-old Volvo truck driver Pavel B., while intoxicated, drove into the oncoming lane and collided with a car. As a result, the 20-year-old driver of the car and his 23-year-old passenger died. Two more passengers - 18 and 22 years old - were hospitalized, but one of them later died in hospital. Previously, the court sent the driver into custody, however, as reported by FactorNovosti, he signed a contract before the New Year and will now go to fight with Ukraine. Before a fatal accident, like Karelian media noted that he had already been deprived of his license twice for drunk driving.
